ui.desc.toggle: AutoTools will always be active and try to get you the best tool. Can be toggled with the set key. (works best with "Switch Back")
ui.desc.showDPS: Displays the weapons Dps when hovering over it.
ui.desc.keepSlot: Keeps the selected slot when swapping to a new tool instead of using the vanilla mechanics.
ui.desc.disableCreative: Disables AutoTools in creative-mode if toggle is disabled
ui.desc.preferSilkTouch.always: Autotools additionally will use SilkTouch for: grass, stone, ores, leaves, snow
ui.desc.preferSilkTouch.always_ores: AutoTools additionally will use SilkTouch for ores
ui.desc.preferSilkTouch.except_ores: Autotools additionally will SilkTouch for: grass, stone, leaves, snow
ui.desc.preferSilkTouch.never: Autotools will use SilkTouch if its required to mine a block.
ui.desc.preferFortune: Autotools will use Fortune for Gravel and Leaves
ui.desc.onlyNecessary: AutoTools will only switch items if you can't mine a block with your current one
ui.desc.preferHotbarTool: AutoTools will prefer the tool already in your hotbar if multiple tools have the same mining speed, regardless their durability
ui.desc.preferLowDurability: AutoTools will prefer the tool with the lower durability, instead of the higher one, if they have the same mining speed
ui.desc.switchBack: AutoTools will switch back to the previous tool or item you had in your hand before breaking the block
ui.desc.changeForEntities: AutoTools will change to the tool with the most DPS when looking at an entity.
